revision.comment: Notification of altered sources needing review #IABot (v1.2.5)
revision.text: {{WikiProject Dogs|class= Start|importance= mid}} {{WikiProject Australia|class=start|importance=low|biota=yes}} ==Gaps== This could be revisted after the [[Australian Terrier]] article is cleaned up; that will probably fill in some of the gaps. [[User:Quill|Quill]] 02:48, 2 Apr 2005 (UTC) == Date of Melbourne exhibition == Just noticed a discrepancy; date of Aussie (broken-coated terrier) exhibition was given as 1868; here it's given as 1872. Some more research for me (or anyone else) to do. [[User:Quill|Quill]] 10:36, 13 Apr 2005 (UTC) == NPOV == A new section has been added by what appears to be a newbie, and it does not appear to comply with our neutral point of view policies. [[User:GO-PCHS-NJROTC|GO-PCHS-NJROTC]] [[User talk:GO-PCHS-NJROTC|(Messages)]] 20:19, 27 October 2008 (UTC) :Since it has been many months without further discussion, and since the information was completely uncited, it has been removed.--[[User:Hafwyn|Hafwyn]] ([[User talk:Hafwyn|talk]]) 21:40, 8 March 2009 (UTC) == DMOZ/Open Directory Project == Place club links, kennel links, rescue information links, and other breed-specific informative links on DMOZ at [http://www.dmoz.org/Recreation/Pets/Dogs/Breeds/NonSporting-Utility_Group/Toy_Group/Silky_Terrier www.dmoz.org/Recreation/Pets/Dogs/Breeds/Toy_Group/Silky_Terrier/], not in the Wikipedia article "External links" section. Instructions for submitting links are on the DMOZ page. == Temperament section == There is a proposal that Temperament sections in the dog breed articles be eliminated as they usually contain very similar vague and unreferenced platitudes. Please comment on [[Wikipedia talk:WikiProject Dogs#Temperament sections]].--[[User:Hafwyn|Hafwyn]] ([[User talk:Hafwyn|talk]]) 21:44, 8 March 2009 (UTC) ==Assessment comment== {{Substituted comment|length=304|lastedit=20070104135010|comment=Needs significant expansion and better images. More references and citations will be needed, especially as the article is expanded. Needs links to breed clubs. --[[User:Pharaoh Hound|Pharaoh Hound]] [[User talk:Pharaoh Hound|(talk)]] 13:50, 4 January 2007 (UTC)}} Substituted at 08:39, 29 April 2016 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just modified {{plural:6|one external link|6 external links}} on [[Australian Silky Terrier]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=745578560 my edit]. If you have any questions, or need the bot to ignore the links, or the page altogether, please visit [[User:Cyberpower678/FaQs#InternetArchiveBot|this simple FaQ]] for additional information. I made the following changes: *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20050427055555/http://www.nzkc.org.nz:80/br104.html to http://www.nzkc.org.nz/br104.html *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20081222091619/http://www.ankc.org.au:80/home/breeds_details.asp?bid=26 to http://ankc.org.au/home/breeds_details.asp?bid=26 *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20111006183108/http://www.pickoflitter.co.uk/silkyterrierclub/?p=p_22&sName=history to http://www.pickoflitter.co.uk/silkyterrierclub/?p=p_22&sName=history *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20141205015921/http://www.ankc.org.au/Breed_Details.aspx?bid=26 to http://www.ankc.org.au/Breed_Details.aspx?bid=26 *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20050427055555/http://www.nzkc.org.nz:80/br104.html to http://www.nzkc.org.nz/br104.html *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20090126082824/http://www.ukcdogs.com:80/WebSite.nsf/Breeds/SilkyTerrier to http://www.ukcdogs.com/WebSite.nsf/Breeds/SilkyTerrier When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' or '''failed''' to let others know (documentation at {{tlx|Sourcecheck}}). {{sourcecheck|checked=false}} Cheers.â€”[[User:InternetArchiveBot|'''InternetArchiveBot''']] ([[User talk:InternetArchiveBot|Report bug]]) 00:02, 22 October 2016 (UTC)
